title: DRKG Disease Coverage Gap Quantification

findings.key_insight: The DRKG disease coverage gap is SMALL (4.8% diseases, 1.5% GT pairs). The REAL data gap is in EC disease name→MESH ID matching: 56.9% of EC disease names fail to map, losing 50.9% of EC drug-disease pairs from internal GT. Most unmapped names are SYNONYMS of already-mapped diseases (e.g. 'migraine' vs 'migraine disorders', 'emphysema' vs 'pulmonary emphysema'). Better name matching could potentially double internal GT.

implications: h407 (Comprehensive ID Mapping) is the highest-ROI remaining improvement
Quick win: add ~50 common disease name synonyms to DISEASE_SYNONYMS in disease_name_matcher.py
h709 (parent disease transfer) would recover at most 36 GT pairs for 15 diseases
DRKG updating is NOT a priority - only 22 diseases fully absent, most with tiny GT
